review.reviewbody:
Hello Kyle, I managed to get the missing B3313 version. Thanks to BikdipOnABus as he was kind enough to send me the lost patch file.
I put it on the Internet Archive: https://archive.org/details/b3313v1.0.1
Also Chlorobyte has updated all UATweaked patches for official 1.0 and added a troll where the bps patches sometimes change to versions with a corrupted Luigi model.
I don't know all the changes but you can now switch characters in Nighttime Castle Grounds and difficulty scaling Goombas are fixed in every UATweaks patch.
